var bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.bookId'));

if(!bid>0){
bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.id'));
}
java.put("bid",bid);
var subpath=parseInt((1999+bid)/2000);

result=url;</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.lang.reflect,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.org.jsoup,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
function getZipContent(url){
var res=ByteArrayOutputStream();
var map= HashMap()
map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
var v1=java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
//java.log(v1)
var bis=ByteArrayInputStream(v1);
var zis=ZipInputStream(bis);
var entry=null;
 while((entry= zis.getNextEntry())!=null){
      if(entry.getName()=="chapter.json"){
        var buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
        var length;
        while ((length = zis.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                res.write(buffer, 0, length);
              }
        zis.closeEntry();
        
         
     }else{}
 }
return res.toString();



}
}
//java.log("SSSS"+baseUrl)
result=getZipContent(baseUrl)
//java.log(result);

</js>$.data[*]

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.lang.reflect,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.org.jsoup,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
    function getZipContent(url){
        let bOutput = ByteArrayOutputStream();
        let map = HashMap()
        map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
        let body = java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
        let bInput = ByteArrayInputStream(body);
        let zInput = ZipInputStream(bInput);
        while(zInput.getNextEntry()!=null){
            let buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
            let length;
            while ((length = zInput.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                bOutput.write(buffer, 0, length);
            }
            zInput.closeEntry();
        }
        return bOutput.toString("GBK");
    }
}
getZipContent(baseUrl)
</js>

}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.lang.reflect,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.org.jsoup,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
function getZipContent(url){
var res=ByteArrayOutputStream();
var map= HashMap()
map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
var v1=java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
//java.log(v1)
var bis=ByteArrayInputStream(v1);
var zis=ZipInputStream(bis);
var entry=null;
 while((entry= zis.getNextEntry())!=null){
      if(entry.getName()=="chapter.json"){
        var buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
        var length;
        while ((length = zis.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                res.write(buffer, 0, length);
              }
        zis.closeEntry();
        
         
     }else{}
 }
return res.toString();



}
}
//java.log("SSSS"+baseUrl)
result=getZipContent(baseUrl)
//java.log(result);

</js>$.data[*]

<js>
var Magua = new JavaImporter();
Magua.importPackage(
Packages.java.lang,
Packages.java.security,
);
with(Magua) {
  function strToMd5(str) {
Â    let md5 = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
Â    let bytes = md5.digest(String(str).getBytes());
Â    let stringBuffer = new StringBuilder();
    let bt = null;
Â    bytes.forEach(a => {
Â Â Â    bt = a & 0xff;
Â Â Â    if (bt < 16) {
Â Â Â Â Â    stringBuffer.append("0");
Â Â   Â  }
Â Â Â    stringBuffer.append(Integer.toHexString(bt));
Â    });
Â    return stringBuffer.toString();
  }
}
function getSig(timestamp, params) {
  return strToMd5("45667191c50941a1a777dfbd84345fe8" + timestamp + params);
}

if (baseUrl.match("key=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("key=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  keyword: String(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("date=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("date=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: 39,
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0,
  date: parseInt(input[0])
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/infov1&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
 result= JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("id=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("id=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: parseInt(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0
  });
  var url =  "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/info&timestamp=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else {
  result=JSON.parse(result).data
}
JSON.stringify(result)
</js>$.[*]

	author: og('novel:author'),

	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(æ­£æ–‡|VIPç« èŠ‚|ç« èŠ‚ç›®å½•|æœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚)?(\s+|_)|[\(ï¼ˆã€].*[æ±‚æ›´è°¢ä¹å‘æ¨].*/g, '') + ' â€¢ ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: 'ã€€ã€€ğŸ”¸æœ€è¿‘æ›´æ–°ï¼š' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(è§‚çœ‹å°è¯´|ç®€ä»‹)[:ï¼š]|åˆ†äº«ä¹¦ç±.*|å„ä½ä¹¦å‹.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var text = "";
var mat = result.match(/var chapterContent = "([^"]*?)";/);
if(mat){
text = mat[1];
}
unescape(text.replace(/\\/g,'%'))
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
var pageNum=1;
var mat=src.match(/"total_page":(\d+)/);
if(mat){
pageNum=mat[1];
}
var list = [];
var bid = java.get("bid");
for(var i=2;i<=pageNum;i++){
var body = "bid="+bid+"&page_size=50&page="+i;
var option={"charset": "utf-8","method": "POST","body": String(body)};
var url = "https://book.sina.cn/dpool/newbook/bookv1/ajax/get_catalog.php"+","+JSON.stringify(option);
list.push(url);
}
list
</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util 
);
with(javaImport){
    let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b");
    let ALGORITHM = "DES"; 
    let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
    let CHARSET = "utf-8";
    let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN");


function decode(data){
let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes());
let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks);
let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM);
let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET));
cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv);
return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET);

}
}
//DESè§£å¯†ç»“æŸ

}else{result=content+say}
</js>

result=url+JSON.stringify(json)

function decrypt(data){
    var key = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse("bmpsZW1lbmcyMDE4MjAxNw==");
    var iv = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse('MTIzNDU2NzgxMjM0NTY3OA==');

    var decryptedData = CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(data, key, {
        iv: iv,
        mode: CryptoJS.mode.CBC,
        padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7
    });
    return JSON.parse(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.stringify(decryptedData));
}

searchUrl:
<js> var body = {
  "sort": "default",
  "page": 1,
  "q": "{{key}}",
  "rootKind": "",
  "query": "
    query getFilterWorksList($works_ids: [ID!]) {
      worksList(worksIds: $works_ids) {
        
    
    title
    cover
    url
    isBundle
    coverLabel
  
    
    url
    title
  
    
    author {
      name
      url
    }
    origAuthor {
      name
      url
    }
    translator {
      name
      url
    }
  
    
    abstract
    editorHighlight
  
    
    isOrigin
    kinds {
      
    name @skip(if: true)
    shortName @include(if: true)
    id
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      wordCount
      wordCountUnit
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      
    isEssay
    
    ... on EssayWorks {
      favorCount
    }
  
    
    isNew
    
    averageRating
    ratingCount
    url
  
  
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      isColumn
      isEssay
      onSaleTime
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        updateTime
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      isColumn
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        isFinished
      }
    }
    ... on EssayWorks {
      essayActivityData {
        
    title
    uri
    tag {
      name
      color
      background
      icon2x
      icon3x
      iconSize {
        height
      }
      iconPosition {
        x y
      }
    }
  
      }
    }
    highlightTags {
      name
    }
  
    isInLibrary
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
  
    }
    ... on EbookWorks {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      ... on EbookWorks {
        id
        isPurchased
        isInWishlist
      }
    }
  
        id
        isOrigin
      }
    }
  ",
  "variables": {}
};
var option = {"method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(body) }; "https://read.douban.com/j/search_v2," + JSON.stringify(option) </js>

//DESåŠ å¯†å¼€å§‹
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util  
);
with(javaImport){
function encryptByDES(massage, keydata) {
        let cipher = Cipher.getInstance("DES");
        let keySpec = new DESKeySpec(String(keydata).getBytes());
         let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
         let key = keyFactory.generateSecret(keySpec);      
        cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE, key);
        return Base64.encodeToString(cipher.doFinal(String(massage).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP)
}
}
//DESåŠ å¯†ç»“æŸ

var deskey = 'web@hzlq';
var userId='0';
function getPostUrl(data,type) {
var url = 'http://m.ndlib.cn/nlc_read_home/service.do,';
var md5Key = 'library_2016@hzlq';
value = {
    siteId: 1,
    data:String(encryptByDES(JSON.stringify(data), deskey)),
    userId: userId,
    fromSource: 3,
    osType: 5,
    version: "1.0.1",
    versionCode: 10001,
    timeStamp: data.timeStamp,
    hashCode: String(java.md5Encode(data.timeStamp + md5Key))
}
var option={
"method":"POST",
"body":'cmd='+type+'&value=' + encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(value))
}
return url + JSON.stringify(option);
}

    timeStamp:Date.now(),

};

if(baseUrl.match(/categoryId/)){

}else{

}
